original_title: Betty Boop - Vol. 1: 22 Cartoon Classics - 2 Hours
overview: Enjoy over 2 hours of classic Betty Boop cartoons from the 1930s. Betty Boop is one of the most beloved cartoon characters of all time! Watch Betty Boop in some of her earliest vintage cartoons along with her friends Pudgy the Dog and Grampy. Boop-Oop-a-Doop! Features remastered sound!
title: Betty Boop - Vol. 1: 22 Cartoon Classics - 2 Hours
